data.description:
## Production Stabilization KPI Metrics

This dashboard is designed to give our team, at a glance, key performance indicators (KPI) for our on-going effort to stabilize our platforms.

The current list of KPI's, as outlined by Nir are as follows:

 - Number of jobs failing, and total
 - Number of searches failing, and total
 - Latency of searches, 
 - Latency of jobs
 - Number of Enrich calls failing, and total
data.title: Production Stabilization KPI Metrics

definition.content:
# KPI 1: DOZI DJSR Jobs / Failures:
DOZI Jobs (Total vs. Failed) NOTE: Currently only shows data from current 1 week index.  Going forward, the 2 metrics on the right replace these, based on these but they currently have little historical data)

# KPI 2: Search Service Requests / Failures:
Search Metrics (Mouse over each line in the graph to the right, the graph shows all searches from our varied search services across projects/plaforms) NOTE: This is a NEW metric based on logs, which has no historical data.

definition.title: Latency on service dozi-search-service-apps in env production

definition.content:
# KPI 3: DOZI Search Service APPS Latency:
Latency for Search Services APPS in DOZI (From APM Traces)

# KPI 4: DOZI Search Service JOBS Latency:
Latency for Search Services JOBS in DOZI (From APM Traces)

# KPI 5: Number of Enrich calls failing, and total.

Also added Enrich Match Requests, Jobs Started, Latency and Errors (only after 5 retries)

definition.title: Latency on service dozi-search-service-jobs in env production

definition.content:
## KPI 6: Login Metrics:
Service: "login-backend"
Logs from this service are determined by:
"message:("login request for" AND "succeeded") service:login-backend" OR 
message:("login request for" AND "failed") service:login-backend

data.description:
### Istio

- [What is Istio](https://istio.io/docs/concepts/what-is-istio/)?
- [Envoy](https://istio.io/docs/concepts/what-is-istio/#envoy), a high performance proxy.
    - XDS = Envoy management APIs that can be implemented by backend servers. 
        - These APIs support:
            - Cluster discovery service (CDS)
            - Route discovery service (RDS)
            - Endpoint discovery service (EDS)
            - Listener discovery service (LDS)
- [Mixer](https://istio.io/docs/concepts/what-is-istio/#mixer), enforces access control and usage policies across the service mesh, and collects telemetry data from the Envoy proxy and other services.
- [Pilot](https://istio.io/docs/concepts/what-is-istio/#pilot), provides service discovery for the Envoy sidecars, traffic management capabilities for intelligent routing (e.g., A/B tests, canary rollouts, etc.), and resiliency (timeouts, retries, circuit breakers, etc.).
- [Citadel](https://istio.io/docs/concepts/what-is-istio/#citadel), enables strong service-to-service and end-user authentication with built-in identity and credential management.
- [Galley](https://istio.io/docs/concepts/what-is-istio/#galley), configuration validation, ingestion, processing and distribution component.)
